name: Roky Mahmud
review: Starting at just $35 for the 2GB model, the Raspberry Pi 4 is the world's best single-board computer, a must-have for tech enthusiasts of all ages.

name: Anis Mahmud
review: The Raspberry Pi 4 is a big upgrade over past models, with more processing muscle, better video support and no compromises in price or capabilities.

name: Liton Das
review: It is a good product.But i am not used to it.

name: Anika Islam
review: Significantly more powerful than past models USB 3.0 ports supports dual 4K video output Convenient USB Type-C power

name: Riaz Mahmud
review: Not compatible with older Raspberry Pi cases Potential compatibility issues with some USB Type-C power cables Software compatibility is hit or miss

name: Andy josh
review: I am a big fan of Raspberry Pi 4
